head.title: Another Approach To AIDS in Africa

hedline.hl1: Another Approach To AIDS in Africa

block.p: Scientists at the 13th international AIDS conference were disappointed that President Thabo Mbeki of South Africa would not acknowledge forthrightly that H.I.V. causes AIDS, focusing instead on social factors as a major force behind Africa's epidemic. But what is implicit in his remarks is that some AIDS problems can be attacked now, even before there are vaccines and cures. News analysis, Page 6.
